text: Michael John Sullivan (born September 22, 1939) is an American lawyer and politician. He was the 29th Governor of Wyoming from 1987 to 1995, and United States Ambassador to Ireland from 1998 to 2001. ==References== Category:Governors of Wyoming Category:Politicians from Omaha, Nebraska Category:People from Casper, Wyoming Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States to Ireland Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Wyoming Category:Lawyers from Omaha, Nebraska
title: Mike Sullivan (governor)
